review: I purchased the Fire Stick as part of my "Cutting the Cord on Cable".  I finally got fed up with paying over $115 per/month for cable and getting nothing out of it.I am disappointed in the Fire Stick after connecting it to my TV only because it is useless without paying for the services (apps) that it connects with.I was hoping the Fire Stick connected us with some free TV channels on the internet as well as many paid sites but,  it does not.The ease of using the Fire Stick is great but the other required cost to use it are not.Baytown, Texas
